content: https://www.sportspredictionslab.com⚽️ NUMBER ONE SPORTS PREDICTIONS WEBSITE IN THE WORLD ⚾️ JOIN NOW!!17019 REGISTERED USERS24975 PREDICTIONS GIVEN75%+ WINRATEhttps://www.sportspredictionslab.comJOIN US AND WIN BIG!!Our Team is formed by twenty-three PROFESSIONAL Sports Betting men and women.Their impressive skills are amplified by the use of a PRIVATE ALGORITHM created after NINE years of study and work.Buy Credits (SPC) and request your Sports Prediction for Football, Tennis, Basketball, Volleyball, Hockey, Table Tennis, Esports and Baseball.Your prediction will be given within 5-10 minutes. This is the time needed for our Team to accept your request and allow our Algorithm to work.A single match is worth 1 SPC.Payment methods: Cryptocurrencies or Stake Tip.SUPPORT AREATelegram @splsupportREFERRAL PROMO!!GET 25$ IN CRYPTO EVERY FRIEND YOU BRING TO THE WEBSITE THAT MAKES A SPC PURCHASE.YOUR FRIEND GETS 25$ TOO!SPC(Credits) BUNDLES:1 SPC = 1 Prediction1 SPC Bundle : 79$5 SPCs Bundle: 335$ (Save 15%)10 SPCs Bundle: 550$ (Save 30%)20 SPCs Bundle: 940$ (SAVE 40%!)30 SPCs Bundle: 1065$ (SAVE 55%!!)SPECIAL 100 SPCs Bundle: 1975$ (SAVE 75%!!!For all those who are looking for a secure weekly or monthly income and wish to entrust their bankroll to our professionals.Multiply your bankroll over a pre-set period of time from our platform.This feature is only available for High Stakers.We make a profit from your own investment, so only amounts that are considered valid are accepted.USE OUR SPL INVESTMENT CENTER NOW!! https://www.sportspredictionslab.com@splsupport (Telegram)We are open to give free credits to a small number of skeptic(and trusted) people to give feedbacks of our platform. ùDue to recent INSANE amount of support we've had, we will be doing TWO different giveaways for October.$1,000BTC will be given to a registered member.$10,000BTC will be given to a registered member who has purchased atleast one bundle.We remind that, as every giveaway, this will be done LIVE on Discord using Google random number generator.End of Giveaway: 03 Nov 2022.Quote from: Yllito on October 18, 2022, 09:22:34 PMSpoke to them on telegram , they were kind enough to give a free prediction which resulted in a winsport:47016428 Edit: they gave me a other free prediciton that resulted in a win sport:47020274both were live and interaction with support team that gave me the prediciton was smooth during the live games!Following a negative review received, as we disagree on the outcome and we are sorry to have our reputation on this forum "ruined", as this man has activity inside the community, we are now offering for a limited time ONE FREE SPC to have a free prediction to any new registered account.

comments.author: Little Mouse

On the other hand, if they predict from some shit leagues, they can fix matches lol. Otherwise, it's never possible.@OPYour second link is wrong. You didn’t put : after https.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Upon checking it is good if you button is at the same time is interactive by that you can notify your users that your platform is working just like add a hover for the buttons or the landing page it self, also it is good that you didn't put the number of wages in your platform it is looks like kind of suspicious right now in my perspective.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Maasdamer on August 31, 2022, 04:38:15 AM98.84% SUCCESS RATE.      People won’t risk their money for the rest 1.16% to be honest.Many people like me don’t like to invest or gamble money with other people’s advice. As if by chance the investment went to loss, then definitely we will continuously blame the site.So it’s better to do calculations and predictions while betting on their own.People are not believing on fixed matches and therefore not betting it, so how the hell people will buy predictions which are not 100% correct and will place the bet.

comments.author: GigiBet
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on August 31, 2022, 12:30:13 PMQuote from: Maasdamer on August 31, 2022, 04:38:15 AM98.84% SUCCESS RATE.      People won’t risk their money for the rest 1.16% to be honest.Many people like me don’t like to invest or gamble money with other people’s advice. comments.author: mak013
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on August 31, 2022, 12:30:13 PMQuote from: Maasdamer on August 31, 2022, 04:38:15 AM98.84% SUCCESS RATE.      People won’t risk their money for the rest 1.16% to be honest.Many people like me don’t like to invest or gamble money with other people’s advice. As if by chance the investment went to loss, then definitely we will continuously blame the site.So it’s better to do calculations and predictions while betting on their own.People are not believing on fixed matches and therefore not betting it, so how the hell people will buy predictions which are not 100% correct and will place the bet.You`re wrong. There are lots of people that like risk. And 98% looks very interesting, when the odds 1.7-2.65. But it is unbelievable percent. Winning percentage 60-70 percent looks nice enough for predictions. And here we see 98%. I don`t believe it. It is impossible to make 13800 bets and make less than 200 mistakes. PS. Site looks very simple, it takes 2-3 hours to create. I don`t ready to risk my money for nonames.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Maasdamer on August 31, 2022, 04:38:15 AM98.84% SUCCESS RATE.      There’s no such thing like this in gambling, I don’t know what kind of hype is this but claiming to be the top prediction site in the world is an overhype for me. I will take cautious if the site market their platform like this,  don’t trust any site easily keep on doing your research first before trying. Well, following someone’s advice when it comes to predictions is quiet not good, I’d rather do my own analysis than to depend to anyone which is more risky.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: So this is only available for Stake.com users?Just a reminder to those planning to subscribe to be cautious. This so called "private algorithm" could be violating terms and conditions. I remember reading a case not too long ago where the user's account had been warned initially for allegedly taking advantage of the faster feed he gets from sports. The platform used is also Stake.

The platform used is also Stake.No, this has nothing to do with Stake platform.We are not related to the Stake platform.But we do like and suggest Stake as betting platform, as we do use Stake as betting platform ourselves.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: GigiBet on August 31, 2022, 12:42:28 PMI can't see why people shouldn't bet hundreds on a close to 100% chance of winning.  Can you show us some data to back your claim? How do we believe that you are speaking the truth, not simply trying to fool us. I haven’t seen anyone with 1000 bets and 90% success rate. That would made him rich. Can you please share us some proof?There are a tipster in the gambling discussion section. I can't remember his username. He provides everything transparently. If you have something like that, I would believe your claim. Otherwise, you are a liar and very much likely a scammer too.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: GigiBet on August 31, 2022, 12:42:28 PMFor all those who are looking for a secure weekly or monthly income and wish to entrust their bankroll to our professionals.Multiply your bankroll over a pre-set period of time from our platform.I am still trying to understand how your algorithm guarantees a secure weekly or monthly income. As @Little Mouse stated more data is needed to back your claims. Another thing I found is that the domain name has been registered on 2022-08-25 and is registered only for a year. That does not look good when you trying to promote yourself as a secure way to earn constant income.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on September 01, 2022, 03:23:00 AMAnother thing I found is that the domain name has been registered on 2022-08-25 and is registered only for a year. That does not look good when you trying to promote yourself as a secure way to earn constant income.Damn! I didn’t check out that. Now it's pretty obvious that they are providing a fake ratio which means they are obvious scam. How come they claim such thing while they have registered only a few days back? They are only here to sell some of their shit credit and then have some stupid prediction. I'm sure they will provide different prediction for different players so that they can get a correct guess and win their trust.Stay away from this service. This is a SCAM.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I think is is very hard to convinced users over here, sometimes i imagine how people falls into investment scheme whereby losing their funds to unrecognized site or highly rated site. How secure is your website and of what aspect is your team members being verified. If i may asked i would want you to share some of those who have attestify your website maybe of all total numbers of users who signed up from your website why are there no one from bitcointalk here or a reputable users who have tried out your platform to give an accurate feedback from his or her experience.Everyone be mindful on a kind of sites that just tends to offer you kinds of bonuses.
